title: Drawing, "Project for bible marker", 1915–25
medium: Pencil; creamy, dark lilac watercolor; cardboard
description: Top: a triangular top in Gothic style with the Pascal lamb. Bottom: three lower parts of ribbons with pendants, quatrefoils in Gothic style containing, in pierced work, respectively: A; [an X bisected with the descender of a lowercase p]; [the Greek letter omega]. Bordering lines.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for bible marker", 1915–25.Pencil; creamy, dark lilac watercolor; cardboard. 1939-84-35-a.
